workflow_name: Receive updates on form submission in Mautic and send SMS notification
tools_integrations: Google Sheets, OpenAI, SMS, Slack, Twitter
what_it_does: This workflow automates your Twitter presence using AI to generate engaging content, monitor mentions, and interact with your audience. It can create tweets based on trending topics, respond to mentions intelligently, and analyze engagement metrics to optimize your social media strategy.
page_title: The Vibe Marketer - 10x Your Speed To Market With AI
